group_1.textCenter: Konoha! Hazuki! We've got lotsa requests today!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, you're right.

group_1.textRight: This all started after Nayuta's request for@a bodyguard...
But it was a good idea to ask Mitama and Livia@to handle the publicity.
Even though it cost us a fortune...
The word spread faster than I expected,@so we're getting requests like this every day.

group_1.textLeft: And thanks to the fact that Nayuta was@our first client...
We've been getting requests from Magical Girls@outside of the Union.

group_1.textRight: It's a sign that we've been recognized as@neutral bodyguards.
Hey, hey, Hazuki! How 'bout this one?!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, slow down.
We need to confirm it meets the conditions the@three of us agreed on before we accept a request.
First off...

group_1.narration: "Condition No. 1:@The client must be a Magical Girl active within Kamihama,@regardless of what group she belongs to."
"Condition No. 2:@Our policy is self-defense.@We will refuse any request that would harm other@Magical Girls or involve the fight for the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones."
"Condition No. 3:@The payment is a Grief Seed,@and if the request involves the extermination of Witches,@the dropped Grief Seed will be shared with the client."

group_1.textLeft: ...As for the requests we've received now...
There appears to be no conflict with the@first two conditions.
They also say they can offer a Grief Seed@as payment.
I suppose it's fine to accept any of these@requests.

group_1.textRight: Alllll right! Then let's start with this one!

group_1.textLeft: That's fine. Ayame, would you like to@take care of the reply?

group_1.textRight: ...Becoming bodyguards was the right decision@after all.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...I feel like I'm starting to develop a@more positive outlook.
I'm not sure how to put this...
...I used to believe that the best thing for us@was to "remain the same".
I thought it was unreasonable for us to be@forced to change to conform to our surroundings.
But now...even if we're forced to change...
I know that the change is for our own good.
I'm confident that even though our behavior@has changed, our principles have not.

group_1.textRight: I've also felt like our mood has been getting@brighter lately.
I've been trying to figure out why...and now I@know it's the same for you.

group_1.textLeft: What's the same...?

group_1.textRight: We feel like we can be ourselves!

group_1.textLeft: ...You're right...

group_1.textRight: Konoha! Hazuki! This is our next request!
